name: 神明在上(Zengeon)
detailed_description:
Diverse Character experience

In the 'Zengeon' world, there are different characters to choose from, each with completely different skills and features. The game focuses on the "Action" component of the action role-playing game. You need to make different operations and strategies in real time according to the understanding of different characters, and get a rhythmic and diverse battle in the process of familiarizing with the unique character's experience.

Rich prop system

On the adventure road you have the opportunity to get a variety of props, each of them has its own unique effect, choose the props you like will bring a rich combination to make the battle journey full of interesting variables, and then match the role Features create your own fighting genre.

Roguelike element game experience

There are no save points in the game, and each round has different fun in the random level challenge and the acquisition of the props.

Multi-directional story interpretation

Each character in the story has its own exclusive memory, retrieving their memories and finding a journey that belongs to each character.

h2]Multiplayer game[/h2]
The game provides multiplayer game mode. We encourage players to play games with good friends and enjoy the challenge.

Contact us


Official QQ Group: 650674392

BBS: https://tieba.baidu.com/f?kw=%E7%A5%9E%E6%98%8E%E5%9C%A8%E4%B8%8A&ie=utf-8

short_description: ‘Zengeon’ is an action role-playing game with anime style and Roguelike elements. At the time of the Luna eclipse, the enchantment of ‘DongTianFudi’ was inexplicably broken, resulting in darkness come out. In order to restore the enchantment, the player will be act the student who experienced the event.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7 / Windows8 / Windows10
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT710
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: I7-6700HQ 2.59GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

developers: 成都独立开发者联盟网络科技有限公司
publishers: 成都独立开发者联盟网络科技有限公司
